tags: The Bitcoin Chronicles â€” Arc 2.H.2 - The Weight of Instant Truth

As entangled networks remove delay from interworld coordination, a subtler consequence emerges: psychological compression. Elias Walker begins to sense that living inside instant verification alters not only governance, but the human nervous system itself.
content:
## The Bitcoin Chronicles â€” Arc 2.H.2 - The Weight of Instant Truth

As entangled networks remove delay from interworld coordination, a subtler consequence emerges: psychological compression. Elias Walker begins to sense that living inside instant verification alters not only governance, but the human nervous system itself.
